title: Video demonstrates using 3D touch screen iPhone 6s to weigh objects, opens up new use cases
text:
Video demonstrates using 3D touch screen iPhone 6s to weigh objects, opens up new use cases 
Published By: 9to5mac.com - Today 
Developer Simon Gladman today demonstrated the use of the iPhone 6s display as a way to compare weights of an object, here denoted in a pe...
